about_the_game:
Get Inside the Animal!

Every stage in Nosher is a wondrous labyrinth of secrets waiting for you to discover. The only issue is poor Nosher can't reach the secrets.

Nosh on a bat, gain the ability to fly. Nosh on a skeleton, gain the ability to smash the big rock. Nosh on a spider, explore the verticle landscape of each stage. Nosher is a puzzle platformer that rewards you for exploring; whether that's with a hidden collectible to achieve a platinum score or a giant bat to make friends with.

Nosh on These Berries

Nother is built off the love for the golden age of puzzle platformers. Berries in Nosher are so much more than berries, they are life. Collecting them will not only provide a 'second chance' for Nosher, but they're also a key part of achieving a high score on each stage.

Platforming is More Than Just Collectibles

Collectibles are nice, but they're not everything. Every stage in Nosher offers four tiers for rewards; bronze, silver, gold, and platinum. To prove you're the best in noshing you'll need to combine stage knowledge, speedrunning, and some cheeky tactics to claim the top prize.

name: Nosher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel i5-3570 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 2GB / AMD Radeon™ HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Nosher serves up the perfect platforming meal. Nosh on a variety of 'enemy treats' to possess their powers and movement, opening up more of the stages to find those hidden secrets you remember from classic '90s platformers.
